wikitext.*:
'''''vanwa''''' is a [[Quenya]] adjective meaning "lost".<ref name="WAN">{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''WAN'''</ref>

===Etymology===
[[Root]] [[WAN]];<ref name="WAN"/> adjetivation from ''[[auta-]]''.

==Examples==
*''[[Mar Vanwa Tyaliéva|Mar '''Vanwa''' Tyaliéva]]'' = "The Cottage of Lost Play"
*''Si '''vanwa''' ná, Rómello '''vanwa''', Valimar!'' = "Now '''lost''', '''lost''' to those of the East is Valimar!"<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}, line 15</ref>
